oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Coca-Cola delivery truck
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of an unidentified man driving a Coca-Cola delivery truck. Signs that read "Drink Coca-Cola" are on the side of the truck and above the running board. Cases of bottles can be seen on the flatbed. A smaller photograph of another Coca-Cola delivery truck is inset on the bottom right corner and is the same image as 10268. Text in the top right corner reads: "Delivery service in 1915. The first Coca-Cola plant was opened in 1905."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Trucks; Carbonated beverages; Men
